title: Artificial Intelligence Practical Skills Enhancement: Math Problem-Solving Competency Development through Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Mathematical Concepts (Functions, Statistics, Calculus)
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners complete online collaborative discussions and assignments with a participation rate of 80% or higher.
Learners successfully accomplish an average of 1.5 applied mathematics projects per month through collaborative learning activities.
Learners achieve a 20% or greater improvement in math problem-solving ability assessments after the collaborative learning process.
Learners report a collaborative learning experience of 4.0/5.0 or higher in the final satisfaction survey.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
